Print these plots before the workshop

\clearpage

```{r echo=F, include=T, results="asis", fig.width=9, fig.height=6}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyverse)
studyhabits <- read_csv('https://benwhalley.github.io/rmip/data/studyhabitsandgrades.csv')
set.seed(1234)
for (i in 1:16) {
  p <- studyhabits %>%
    sample_n(10) %>%
    ggplot(aes(work_hours, grade)) + geom_point() + ggtitle(paste("Example", i))
  print(p)
}

```

```{r, eval=F, include=F, echo=F}
# knit myself into a pdf
Sys.setenv(PATH=paste0(Sys.getenv('PATH'),':/usr/local/bin/'))
rmarkdown::render('regression-example-plots.rmd',
                  output_format = "pdf_document")
```
